title: Here is a list of 20 articles up
**"Multilingual Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems: A Survey"** - This survey provides a comprehensive overview of the state of the art in multilingual ToD systems

**"Cross-Lingual Transfer Learning for Multilingual Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems"** - This paper discusses methods for transferring knowledge from high-resource languages to low-resource languages in ToD systems
**"XLM-R: A Pre-trained Cross-Lingual Language Model for Multilingual NLP"** - This paper introduces XLM-R, a model that has been used for various multilingual NLP tasks, including ToD
**"Zero-Shot Cross-Lingual Dialogue Systems with Transferable Latent Variables"** - This study explores zero-shot learning approaches for cross-lingual dialogue systems
**"Multilingual BERT for Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems"** - This paper evaluates the performance of multilingual BERT in ToD systems across different languages
Multilingual Dialogue Generation with Polyglot Models"** - This research introduces Polyglot models for generating dialogues in multiple languages
**"Cross-Lingual Natural Language Understanding for Task-Oriented Dialogue"** - This paper focuses on cross-lingual NLU techniques for ToD systems
**"Multilingual Dialogue State Tracking with Joint BERT"** - This study presents a joint BERT model for dialogue state tracking in multiple languages
**"Adapting Monolingual Models: Cross-Lingual Transfer Learning for Multilingual Dialogue Systems"** - This paper discusses methods for adapting monolingual models to multilingual settings
**"Multilingual Dialogue Systems with Pre-trained Language Models"** - This research explores the use of pre-trained language models in multilingual dialogue systems
**"Cross-Lingual Transfer Learning for Natural Language Generation in Task-Oriented Dialogue"** - This paper investigates cross-lingual transfer learning for NLG in ToD systems
**"Multilingual Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems with Transformer Models"** - This study evaluates the performance of transformer models in multilingual ToD systems
**"Leveraging Multilingual Pre-trained Models for Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems"** - This research leverages multilingual pre-trained models for improving ToD systems
**"Cross-Lingual Dialogue Systems with Multilingual Embeddings"** - This paper explores the use of multilingual embeddings in cross-lingual dialogue systems
**"Multilingual Dialogue Systems: Challenges and Opportunities"** - This article discusses the challenges and opportunities in developing multilingual dialogue systems
**"Multilingual Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems with Transfer Learning"** - This study investigates the use of transfer learning in multilingual ToD systems
**"Cross-Lingual Dialogue State Tracking with Pre-trained Language Models"** - This paper focuses on cross-lingual dialogue state tracking using pre-trained language models
**"Multilingual Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems with Cross-Lingual Knowledge Transfer"** - This research explores cross-lingual knowledge transfer techniques for ToD systems
**"Multilingual Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems with Joint Learning"** - This study presents joint learning approaches for multilingual ToD systems
**"Cross-Lingual Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems with Multilingual Pre-trained Models"** - This paper investigates the use of multilingual pre-trained models in cross-lingual ToD systems

These articles cover a wide range of topics and approaches in the field of multilingual task-oriented dialogue systems, providing a solid foundation for understanding the current state of research and development in this area
